item.title: SLB
item.description: score:143 Chances: The average brokerage recommendation for Schlumberger (SLB) is equivalent to a Buy, indicating positive sentiment among analysts. The market is calm for now, but it is prudent to position your portfolio for eventual volatility later this year. Looking at fundamentals, the outlook for corporate earnings continues to be solid.
